description: Admin Portal Web Application that offers a way to manage contracts with companies, manufacturers and dealers in the world of construction of different unit structures.
contributions: I participated developing and refactoring this application following best development practices of React. I proposed replacing formik with react hook form to improve the performance of our application due to the re-render problem we experienced when using formik to handle and control form validations. Finally, I have worked on several new features since my arrival, such as the Matic Checkout feature.
